# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the column encoding error suitable for debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Getting Error Information

- **columnName**: The name of the column with the error.
- **encodingError**: The underlying encoding error.
- **rowIndex**: The index of the column’s element with the error.

items.description: The name of the column with the error.
items.name: columnName

items.description: The index of the column’s element with the error.
items.name: rowIndex
